name: Quirk Duck
text: You can Special Summon this card from hand if you control a "Duck" monster. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect: You can add 1 card that lists "Duck" in it's text from your GY to your hand. You cannot activate cards with that name for the rest of this turn. If this card is in the GY: You can send one "Duck" effect monster you control to the GY; Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You can activate each effect of  "Quirk Duck" once per turn.
